info.description: This is the public Twilio REST API.
info.title: Twilio REST API

parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.
parameters.name: PageSize

parameters.description: The human-readable name of this conversation, limited to 256 characters. Optional.
parameters.name: FriendlyName

parameters.description: The date that this resource was created.
parameters.name: DateCreated

parameters.description: The date that this resource was last updated.
parameters.name: DateUpdated

parameters.description: The unique id of the [SMS Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sms/services/api) this conversation belongs to.
parameters.name: MessagingServiceSid

parameters.description: The HTTP method to be used when sending a webhook request.
parameters.name: Method

parameters.description: The list of webhook event triggers that are enabled for this Service: `onMessageAdded`, `onMessageUpdated`, `onMessageRemoved`, `onConversationUpdated`, `onConversationRemoved`, `onParticipantAdded`, `onParticipantUpdated`, `onParticipantRemoved`
parameters.name: Filters

parameters.description: The absolute url the pre-event webhook request should be sent to.
parameters.name: PreWebhookUrl

parameters.description: The absolute url the post-event webhook request should be sent to.
parameters.name: PostWebhookUrl

parameters.description: The routing target of the webhook. Can be ordinary or route internally to Flex
parameters.name: Target

parameters.description: The unique id of the [Conversation](https://www.twilio.com/docs/conversations/api/conversation-resource) for messages.
parameters.name: ConversationSid

parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.
parameters.name: PageSize

parameters.description: The unique id of the [Conversation](https://www.twilio.com/docs/conversations/api/conversation-resource) for this message.
parameters.name: ConversationSid

parameters.description: The channel specific identifier of the message's author. Defaults to `system`.
parameters.name: Author

parameters.description: The content of the message, can be up to 1,600 characters long.
parameters.name: Body

parameters.description: The date that this resource was created.
parameters.name: DateCreated

parameters.description: The date that this resource was last updated. `null` if the message has not been edited.
parameters.name: DateUpdated

parameters.description: The unique id of the [Conversation](https://www.twilio.com/docs/conversations/api/conversation-resource) for this message.
parameters.name: ConversationSid

parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this resource.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.name: ConversationSid

parameters.name: Sid

parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The channel specific identifier of the message's author. Defaults to `system`.
parameters.name: Author

parameters.description: The content of the message, can be up to 1,600 characters long.
parameters.name: Body

parameters.description: The date that this resource was created.
parameters.name: DateCreated

parameters.description: The date that this resource was last updated. `null` if the message has not been edited.
parameters.name: DateUpdated

parameters.description: The unique id of the [Conversation](https://www.twilio.com/docs/conversations/api/conversation-resource) for participants.
parameters.name: ConversationSid

parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.
parameters.name: PageSize

parameters.description: The unique id of the [Conversation](https://www.twilio.com/docs/conversations/api/conversation-resource) for this participant.
parameters.name: ConversationSid

parameters.description: A unique string identifier for the conversation participant as [Chat User](https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/chat/rest/users). This parameter is non-null if (and only if) the participant is using the Programmable Chat SDK to communicate. Limited to 256 characters.
parameters.name: Identity

parameters.description: The address of the participant's device, e.g. a phone number or Messenger ID. Together with the Proxy address, this determines a participant uniquely. This field (with proxy_address) is only null when the participant is interacting from a Chat endpoint (see the 'identity' field). Limited to 256 characters.
parameters.name: MessagingBinding.Address

parameters.description: The address of the Twilio phone number (or WhatsApp number, or Messenger Page ID) that the participant is in contact with. This field, together with participant address, is only null when the participant is interacting from a Chat endpoint (see the 'identity' field). Limited to 256 characters.
parameters.name: MessagingBinding.ProxyAddress
